class.rdfs:comment: A specific dosing schedule for a drug or supplement.
class.rdfs:label: DoseSchedule

schema:doseUnit.rdfs:comment: The unit of the dose, e.g. 'mg'.
schema:doseUnit.rdfs:label: doseUnit

schema:doseValue.rdfs:comment: The value of the dose, e.g. 500.
schema:doseValue.rdfs:label: doseValue

schema:frequency.rdfs:comment: How often the dose is taken, e.g. 'daily'.
schema:frequency.rdfs:label: frequency

schema:targetPopulation.rdfs:comment: Characteristics of the population for which this is intended, or which typically uses it, e.g. 'adults'.
schema:targetPopulation.rdfs:label: targetPopulation
